title: PlayerUnknown’s Battlegrounds: PUBG
description: PUBG Mobile is a fast-paced battle royale game where players fight for survival, strategy, and victory on dynamic maps.
fullDescription0: PUBG is an online multiplayer battle royale game where players fight for survival on a shrinking map, using strategy, weapons, and teamwork to be the last one standing.

title: Valorant
description: Valorant is a tactical hero shooter where strategy, precision, and teamwork decide victory.
fullDescription0: Valorant is a team-based tactical shooter combining precise gunplay with unique agent abilities, promoting strategy and teamwork.

title: Stardew Valley
description: Stardew Valley lets you escape to a quiet countryside where you can farm, fish, and build a new life full of charm.
fullDescription0: Stardew Valley is a farming simulation game where you grow crops, raise animals, fish, craft, and build relationships with villagers in a charming world.

title: Hollow Knight
description: Hollow Knight is a challenging action-adventure set in a haunting underground kingdom full of secrets and beauty.
fullDescription0: Hollow Knight is a Metroidvania action-adventure game featuring tight platforming, combat, exploration, and a hauntingly beautiful underground world.

title: Celeste
description: Celeste is a heartfelt platformer about climbing a mountain while battling personal struggles and tough challenges.
fullDescription0: Celeste is a narrative-driven platformer that blends tight controls with an emotional story about perseverance. Players take on the role of Madeline, a young woman climbing Celeste Mountain while confronting her inner struggles. Each level offers handcrafted challenges, secret rooms, collectibles, and beautifully designed pixel art environments. The gameplay focuses on precise jumping, dashing, and wall climbing. Celeste is widely praised for its accessibility features, beautiful soundtrack, and deeply meaningful storytelling. The game encourages players through failure, turning each attempt into progress. With hundreds of levels, additional B-Side and C-Side challenges, and optional assist modes, Celeste is both heartwarming and demanding.

title: Among Us
description: Among Us is a multiplayer party game where teamwork and betrayal collide aboard a spaceship.
fullDescription0: Among Us is an online multiplayer social deduction game where crewmates complete tasks while impostors sabotage the ship and eliminate crew members.

title: Dead Cells
description: Dead Cells is a rogue-lite action platformer where you fight, explore, and adapt in a constantly changing castle.
fullDescription0: Dead Cells is a rogue-lite, Metroidvania-inspired action-platformer where players explore procedurally generated levels, defeat enemies, and unlock abilities.

title: Minecraft
description: Minecraft lets players build, explore, and survive in a blocky, procedurally generated 3D world of creativity.
fullDescription0: Minecraft is a sandbox game where players can build structures, explore infinite worlds, mine resources, and survive in a block-based universe.

title: Cuphead
description: Cuphead is a run-and-gun adventure featuring hand-drawn 1930s-style animation and challenging boss battles.
fullDescription0: Cuphead is a classic run-and-gun game with challenging bosses and hand-drawn animations inspired by 1930s cartoons.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: The Witcher 3 is an epic open-world RPG filled with monsters, magic, and moral choices that shape your destiny.
fullDescription0: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt is an expansive open-world RPG where players take the role of Geralt of Rivia, battling monsters, making choices that affect the story, and exploring a rich world.

title: Hades
description: Hades is a fast-paced dungeon crawler where you fight your way out of the Underworld with powerful mythic abilities.
fullDescription0: Hades is an action-packed rogue-like dungeon crawler where players fight through the Underworld, gaining new powers and unraveling the story of Greek gods.

title: Monument Valley
description: Monument Valley is a stunning puzzle game about guiding a princess through impossible architecture and illusion.
fullDescription0: Monument Valley is an artistic puzzle game where players manipulate impossible architecture to guide the silent princess, Ida, through surreal environments.

title: Ori and the Will of the Wisps
description: Ori and the Will of the Wisps is a beautifully animated platform adventure filled with emotion and exploration.
fullDescription0: Ori and the Will of the Wisps is a visually stunning platformer with deep emotional storytelling, tight gameplay, and exploration across enchanting worlds.

title: Hollow Knight: Silksong
description: Hollow Knight: Silksong continues the epic Metroidvania adventure with new protagonist Hornet and breathtaking new worlds.
fullDescription0: Hollow Knight: Silksong is a sequel to Hollow Knight, with new mechanics, combat, and exploration, introducing Hornet as the playable protagonist.

title: Rocket League
description: Rocket League is a high-octane vehicular soccer game blending fast cars and competitive sports.
fullDescription0: Rocket League combines soccer with rocket-powered cars, offering competitive multiplayer matches and fun customization options.

title: Fall Guys
description: Fall Guys is a massively multiplayer party game with up to 60 players competing in chaotic obstacle courses.
fullDescription0: Fall Guys: Ultimate Knockout is a fun battle-royale-style party game where players compete through obstacle courses, mini-games, and eliminations to win the crown.

title: Fall Guys
description: Fall Guys is a massively multiplayer party game with up to 60 players competing in chaotic obstacle courses.
fullDescription0: Fall Guys: Ultimate Knockout is a fun battle-royale-style party game where players compete through obstacle courses, mini-games, and eliminations to win the crown.

description: Fall Guys is a massively multiplayer party game with up to 60 players competing in chaotic obstacle courses.
fullDescription0: Fall Guys: Ultimate Knockout is a fun battle-royale-style party game where players compete through obstacle courses, mini-games, and eliminations to win the crown.
